description: Variant of hemorrhoid; see there for more.

entries.meaning: A haemorrhoid; an affliction mentioned in the Bible usually interpreted as a haemorrhoid.
examples: They hated him sore and banished him from their world, saying: "Without the camp shall be thy resting place, and thou shalt turn and cover thine excrements. The plague of emerods is in thee, and it seals thy passages; our doom for thee is death."
